SEARCH
Package com.hanggrian.countrypicker

Interface CountryPicker

All Known Implementing Classes:
CountryPickerDialog, CountryPickerImpl
public interface CountryPicker
Base interface for country picker popups.

    • getLayout

      @NonNull CountryPickerLayout getLayout()
      Returns:
      picker view.

    • getItems

      @NonNull List<Country> getItems()
      Get country items registered in this picker, or empty if items are not yet set.
      Returns:
      countries, can't be null.

    • setItems

      Populate countries to picker.
      Parameters:
      countries - to set, can't be null.

    • setItems

      Convenient method to set items.
      Parameters:
      countries - to set, can't be null.

    • getFlagDisplay

      @NonNull FlagDisplay getFlagDisplay()
      Get flag image display behavior.
      Returns:
      display mode, can't be null.

    • setFlagDisplay

      void setFlagDisplay(@NonNull FlagDisplay display)
      Set flag image display behavior.
      Parameters:
      display - display mode, default is FlagDisplay.DEFAULT.

    • getNameDisplay

      @NonNull NameDisplay getNameDisplay()
      Get name text display behavior.
      Returns:
      display mode, can't be null.

    • setNameDisplay

      void setNameDisplay(@NonNull NameDisplay display)
      Set name text display behavior.
      Parameters:
      display - display mode, default is NameDisplay.DEFAULT.

    • setOnSelectedListener

      void setOnSelectedListener(@Nullable CountryPickerLayout.OnSelectedListener listener)
      Set listener to be called when a country is selected.
      Parameters:
      listener - to invoke, may be null.
